Feedsta RSS Reader

30 May 2014

Language:

Server:Ruby using the Rails framework ,client: Knockout.js

URL:

http://seng3300-rss-reader.herokuapp.com

Feedsta is a prototype RSS Reader that a few friends at uni and I built as part of a group assesment for a UI design course. It allows you to add rss feeds and sort them by category

Hi I'm Brent Parish, a passionate developer from Australia.

You can contact me at: hello@brentparish.com, follow me on twitter or see what I have been up to on github.
